item.title: An ISO file, a botnet, a World of Warcraft server and me
item.author: Author
item.description: Here is one of my many hacking stories originally posted on my previous website. Please note that all the images in this post are coming from the internet and are here for illustration. A bit of background… A couple of years ago, one of my friend showed me a suspicious email he received at work. As you know me, it was only a matter of seconds before I got the perfect kit of the FBI computer forensics guy.
